column5: Has anyone fished Guerin and the portage lakes? Thanks!
Was there back in 2004(?) Just ok fishing. Had better luck on the portages. Great outfitter.
I'll second the "great outfitter" from the above post. MLO runs a top notch operation - best I've ever used.

The ONLY fly-in fishing outfitter I will use !! Been on 33 fly-in trips with 5 different outfitters and MLO is the only one we have used since we first went with them in 1998 . Don Elliot could write the book on how a fly-in service should run .
